alert.note: Alert for Caroline; Talbot (Maryland) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 16 at 8:38PM EDT by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Sussex, southeastern Talbot and southern Caroline Counties through 930 PM EDT... At 838 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Windyhill, or near Easton, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Easton, Georgetown, Seaford, Millsboro, Laurel, Federalsburg, Bridgeville, Trappe, Dagsboro, Preston, Tanyard, Agner, Choptank, Sycamore, Hambleton, Windyhill, Long Neck, Blades, Frankford and Bethel. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
